pages.title: Baby Passive Mobs
pages.text: $(br)The time it takes for babies to grow to adults is 36000 ticks / 30 min.$(br2)A whole day in aged is 36000 ticks / 30 min.$(li)Day 24000 ticks / 20 min$(li)Night 12000 ticks / 10 min

pages.title: Age
pages.text: The maximum age a mob can have is 5.$(br2)After the baby turned into a mature it takes 252000 ticks / 7 ingame days to age a year.$(br2)While this happens it will have more loot dropped per year.
